text: Women must tell men always that they are the strong ones. They are the big, the strong, the wonderful. In truth, women are the strong ones. It is just my opinion, I am not a professor.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Men don't care what's on TV. They only care what else is on TV.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

text: You know when you're young and you see a play in high school, and the guys all have gray in their hair and they're trying to be old men and they have no idea what that's like? It's just that stupid the other way around.
author: Clint Eastwood

text: Risk is a part of God's game, alike for men and nations.
author: Warren Buffett

text: I will not attack your doctrines nor your creeds if they accord liberty to me. If they hold thought to be dangerous - if they aver that doubt is a crime, then I attack them one and all, because they enslave the minds of men.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll
